name: Adrenaline Shot
description: A serum that fully restores stamina and temporarily increases stamina regeneration.

name: Heavy Ammo
description: Heavy bullets used mainly with large-caliber weapons.

name: Light Ammo
description: Light bullets used mainly with SMGs and light handguns.

name: Medium Ammo
description: Medium bullets used mainly with medium-caliber weapons.

name: Shotgun Ammo
description: Shotgun bullets used mainly with shotguns.

name: Energy Ammo
description: Energy bullets used mainly with energy weapons.

name: Bandage
description: A basic medical item that restores a small amount of health over time.

name: Herbal Bandage
description: An improved medical item that gradually resotres health over time.

name: Sterilized Bandage
description: A sterile bandage for treating wounds.

name: Light Shield
description: A lightweight shield that offers limited protection without severely impacting mobility.
flavorText: Provided for free in every free kit.

name: Medium Shield
description: A standard shield that offers fair protection at a moderate cost to mobility.

name: Heavy Shield
description: A heavy shield that offers maximum protection at a high cost to mobility.

name: Raider Augment I
description: Can be equipped to gain more loadout space and carry capacity. Allows you to equip better shields as well.

name: Raider Augment II
description: Can be equipped to gain more loadout space and carry capacity. Allows you to equip better shields as well.

name: Raider Augment III
description: Can be equipped to gain more loadout space and carry capacity. Allows you to equip better shields as well.

name: Raider Augment IV
description: Can be equipped to gain more loadout space and carry capacity. Allows you to equip better shields as well.

name: Raider Hatch Key
description: Unlocks a raider hatch located around the map for a quick extract
flavorText: Unlocks any Raider Hatch for a quick extract. 20 second timer will be activated when a key is used, allowing anyone to extract.

name: Apricot
description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina

name: Lemon
description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

name: Mushroom
description: Can be consumed for a small amount of health.

name: Olives
description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina.

name: Prickly Pear
description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina

name: Resin
description: Can be used to gradually restore a small amount of health over time.

name: Binoculars
description: Optical instrument for viewing distant objects.

name: Blaze Grenade
description: A grenade that detonates on impact, covering an area in fire that deals damage over time.

name: Healing Stim
description: Heals 25% of your max health.

name: Heavy Fuse Grenade
description: A powerful explosive with a timed fuse.
flavorText: A grenade that detonates after a delay, dealing explosive damage in its radius.

name: Jolt Mine
description: Proximity mines that launch into the air.
flavorText: Pops up and stuns anything within its radius. Not set off by teammates.

name: Jump Mine
description: Proximity mines that launch into the air.
flavorText: Pops up and explodes, damaging anything within its radius. Not set off by teammates.

name: Light Impact Grenade
description: A small grenade designed for light impact and crowd control.
flavorText: Detones on impact, dealing explosive damage in small radius.

name: Lure Grenade
description: A grenade that attracts attention.
flavorText: A noisy device that sticks to surface distracting nearby ARC units and drawing their fire.

name: Photoelectric Cloak
description: A gadget that allows the user to conceal themselves from ARC
flavorText: Must be held to be used. Has a usage bar that slowly refills when not being used. Does not make the Raider invisible, just non-existent to ARC. Emits a loud beeping when being used.

name: Showstopper
description: A small device that emits an EMP when thrown.
flavorText: A grenade that detonates after a delay, stunning nearby Raiders and ARC units.

name: Shield Recharger
description: A handheld repair kit that recharges a shield on use.

name: Smoke Grenade
description: A grenade that creates a cloud of smoke.
flavorText: A grenade that creates a lingering smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from other Raiders.

name: Snap Blast Grenade
description: A grenade that disorients targets.
flavorText: Sticks to surfaces when thrown, dealing damage after a delay

name: Snap Hook
description: A sturdy metal hook with a spring-loaded gate, used for fast attachment.
flavorText: Has a range of 20 meters. Has a usage bar that slowly refills when not being used. Has 3 uses when fully charged.

name: WolfPack
description: A grenade made of a compact bundle of missiles.
flavorText: Scatters into multiple homing missiles, each targetting ARC and dealing explosive damage on impact

name: Zipline
description: A deployable zipline that allows you to quickly move between two locations.
flavorText: Has a range of 50 meters. Line-of-sight is needed to deploy (excluding through smoke).

name: Accordion
description: No provided description for this item yet.

name: Advanced Electrical Components
description: Specialized electrical parts required for advanced repairs and upgrades.

name: Advanced Mechanical Components
description: Mostly used to craft advanced weapons. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

name: Alarm Clock
description: No provided description for this item yet.

name: Antiseptic
description: A bottle of antiseptic liquid for cleaning wounds.

name: ARC Alloy
description: No provided description for this item yet.

name: ARC Circuitry
description: Advanced circuitry used in ARC technology.

name: ARC Coolant
description: No provided description for this item yet.

name: ARC Flex Rubber
description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into rubber.

name: ARC Motion Core
description: A powerful core used in ARC machinery.

name: ARC Powercell
description: Drops from all ARC units.
flavorText: Can be used to recharge shields in a pinch.

name: ARC Synthetic Resin

name: Bastion Part
description: A salvaged component from a Bastion unit.

name: Battery

name: Barricade Kit

flavorText: 500 Health, Can be picked back up after deploying

name: Door Blocker
description: A locking mechanism that can be placed on large metal doors to limit access
flavorText: Can be used on any door without a Raider placed or naturally spawning blocker

name: Bison Driver
description: Can be thrown to create a violent singularity.

name: Hornet Driver

name: Laser Trap: Gas

name: Vita Spray

name: Defibrillator

flavorText: Can be used on Any downed raider, not just teammates.

name: Tagging Grenade
description: A grenade that detonates after a delay.
flavorText: Tags nearby raiders and ARC enemies allowing you to track them.

name: Trigger Nade
description: A grenade that sticks to surfaces and ARC, and detonates when triggered.
flavorText: Deals explosive damage when triggered.

name: Faded Photograph
description: A photograph whose details have faded with time.

description: A small, outdated portable TV.

description: A football that has seen better days.

description: A scented air freshener, barely fragrant.

name: Bloated Tuna Can
description: Something tells you that you don't want to open this...
flavorText: Can be consumed for stamina? Or removes stamina?

name: Expired Pasta
description: Can (reluctantly) be consumed to restore small amounts of health.
